definition: appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Mr Fukuda, by contrast, has a family legacy to enshrine.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，福田康夫有參拜神廟的家庭傳統。

sentences.english: By contrast, unhappy people watched significantly more television in their spare time.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，不幸福的人業餘時間很明顯地多看電視。

sentences.english: In comparison, the Earth orbits at just 1 AU.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，地球軌道只是一個天文單位。

sentences.english: The Chinese Hamster belongs to a group known as Rat-like hamsters.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，中華倉鼠是和老鼠更爲相似的一種倉鼠。

sentences.english: ZTE, by contrast, keeps itself in the background.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，中興公司始終使自己處在幕後的位置。

sentences.english: Sugar, by contrast, comes from living plants.
sentences.chinese: 糖，相比之下，來自於生命植物。

sentences.english: Comparatively, the production manufacture is the humblest activity.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，生產製作是最低賤的活動。

sentences.english: Ichthyosaurs and other contemporary viviparous species, by contrast, gave birth to multiple offspring.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，魚龍和其他現代胎生的物種產下多個幼崽。

sentences.english: In sum, SIRT model is more close to actual tests.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，半參數模型更接近於實際考試情形。

sentences.english: This competition some anticipations are comparatively insufficient.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，這場比賽則有些看點不足。

sentences.english: The North, by contrast, stagnates in isolation and depravation.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，北邊仍然陷於孤立，貧困不堪。

sentences.english: Dolphins and porpoises are less vulnerable and will still be rescued.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，更爲堅強的海豚和鼠海豚是可以被營救的。

sentences.english: How does this picture compare with that other one?
sentences.chinese: 這張圖與那一張相比之下，有何不同？

sentences.english: In comparison women like to tell and share.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，女性喜歡訴說和分享。

sentences.english: By contrast, Hsu Fu Chi commands about a 5.5% share of China's confectionary market.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，徐福記只佔中國糖果市場的5%。

sentences.english: Tea drinkers, in contrast, had longer and more restful slumbers.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，喝茶的人睡得更久更香。
